tables.rationale: Users table has ~3% issues (2% nulls, 1% duplicates). Outliers 0%.
tables.gap: Implement NOT NULL constraints and enforce uniqueness in user_id.

tables.rationale: Orders table has ~18% issues (10% nulls, 3% duplicates, 5% outliers).
tables.gap: Enhance data validation processes, implement deduplication strategies, and deploy anomaly detection for outliers.

tables.rationale: Transactions table has ~35% issues (15% nulls, 0% duplicates, 20% outliers).
tables.gap: Establish strict data entry validation, improve anomaly detection mechanisms, and consider data contracts to ensure quality.
